traits.abilities: is studious, learned, and inquisitive, but is oblivious and absentminded

personality.talent: Skilled actor and master of disguise
personality.mannerism: Brings up anecdotal backstory as examples to conversation Eg. 'Hey that reminds me of the time I-'

voice.quirk: speaks out of the corner of his mouth
